item.title: Sylius Behat scenarios in Chrome Headless inside Docker
item.description: Sylius Behat scenarios in Chrome Headless inside Docker Since this PR, Sylius has started using Chrome Headless to run theirs Behat scenario tagged with @javascript (scenarios that require Javascript engine to run correctly - in short, Javascript suits). After this change, it turned out that Javascript suits speed up from 13 minutes to 8.5 minutes. So, I decided also to run my Javascript suit using Chrome Headless. But there was one problem.
